link.title: Midlay the images don't overlay them

entry.content: Design exploration of the middle laying image for a shop theme. The idea is that a overlay blocks navigation and the middle laying one does not.
entry.summary: Design exploration of the middle laying image for a shop theme. The idea is that a overlay blocks navigation and the middle laying one does not.

entry.title: HTML5 base64 test video
entry.content:
I needed a small base64 video file to check for HTML 5 video tag support in the browser. This is what I came up with.

mp4 version: data:video/mp4;base64,

webm version: data:video/webm;base64,

If you can make the webm version smaller please make a comment.

Video credit: Coffee Cup by Jeffrey Beach
entry.summary: I needed a small base64 video file to check for HTML 5 video tag support in the browser. This is what I came up with.
